answers.answer: I suggest you change doctor I wish I would have I barely know anything I only had 2 sonos I haven't been able to see my babes face my last sono was at 25 weeks I'm almost 37 and Still nothing . not even if he's okay or anything
This is my 3rd pregnancy and usually only get 2 ultrasounds...a baby unless later on if it's to check to see baby/fluid levels if there's a concern..so that's normal

Well even with blood tests I know nothinh just that I don't have diabetes its been a month since I have gone to the doctor and they barely made my appt for tomorrow I don't even kno if he's low enough if  at some dilation or anything

Why don't you ask your doctor? I am only 13 weeks and have only had one appointment so far, but my doctor talked to me before, during, and after the appointment.  She also asked if I had any questions about anything.  If the doctor is not telling you anything ask questions.  If they don't answer them, see abput finding a new doctor.
My doctor doesn't tell me anything and when I ask he just sends me to a different nurse. The nurses are great though.

question: I am 5mths pregnant and I'm getting overwhelmed because I literally don't know anything about my baby just that I'm 5mths! This doctor never tells me anything! I haven't received blood test, don't know the gender, If my weight is normal, my baby's size, nothing!! I read all this things about some of you mom's who know all this things and my doctor never tells me anything...am I overeating? Or should I really feel worried?!
title: I don't know anything about my baby!
